subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Todd Demsey’s odyssey back to the caviar circuit known as the PGA Tour has taken 10 years, bouncing along a path much longer and fraught with more peril than he ever imagined.
snippet: Todd Demsey’s odyssey back to the caviar circuit known as the PGA Tour has taken 10 years, bouncing along a path much longer and fraught with more peril than he ever imagined.
